org.modelio.api.ui

Interface UIColor


  • public interface UIColor
    The UIColor values are named upon a more or less formal set of rules. Here is the rules summary: - 'color-named' colors are named from the color they represent, for example BLACK, WHITE and so on - 'functional-colors' are named from their intended context and usage For 'functional-colors' the name has the form: XXX_YYY_ZZ where: + XXX stands for the SWT widget or category of widget the color applies to. + YYY stands for the functional context of the color + ZZ is either BG for background, FG for foreground Example: TEXT_WRITABLE_BG => background color of a writable SWT Text widget TABLE_EVENROW_BG => background color of the even rows of a table
